project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for selected numerical columns provided by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read the CSV file
Implement functionality to calculate the mean for selected numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the median for selected numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate the mode for selected numerical columns
Implement user interface to select numerical columns from the CSV file
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure they function correctly
